identity.description: A high-precision, dense, and starkly objective interface. No gradients, no fluff. Information is the aesthetic. White background, black text, sharp borders.

headings.usage: Page titles, big metric values. Use tight tracking.

data.usage: Price feeds, wallet addresses, PNL, timestamp logs. CRITICAL for financial trust.

usage_rules: Use 'Signal Blue' (#2563EB) sparingly for active states or new alerts.
Green/Red only for financial vectors (Up/Down, Buy/Sell).

structure: Hero: Split view (Real-time Price vs Polymarket Price).
Grid: Dense 3-column layout for Wallet Tracker, Signals, and Feed.

specific_components.name: PriceTicker
specific_components.description: Large split display showing Binance Price vs Polymarket Price with a calculated 'Lag/Delta' indicator in the middle.

specific_components.name: SignalCard
specific_components.description: AI prediction card. Minimalist. Uses 'Brain' icon or abstract texture.

specific_components.name: WalletRow
specific_components.description: Compact row for wallet tracking. Mono font for address.

components.shadcn_customization: Use 'slate' gray scale. Override rounded-xl to rounded-sm in standard components.

images.description: Clean gold bitcoin on white, use for header logo or empty state
Abstract flow, use as low-opacity overlay for AI Signal panel background

rules: Use 'layout' prop in Framer Motion for list reordering.
Price updates should flash background color (Green/Red) briefly.

universal_guidelines: Dark colors look good when used independently without gradients. DO NOT use dark colors as gradients
Don't make generic centered layouts, simplistic gradients, and uniform styling.
Create depth through layered design elements with z-index hierarchy
Use glass-morphism effects with backdrop filters (12-24px blur)
You MUST NOT apply universal transition. Eg: transition: all. This results in breaking transforms. Always add transitions for specific interactive elements like button, input excluding transforms
You MUST NOT center align the app container, ie do not add .App { text-align: center; } in the css file. This disrupts the human natural reading flow of text
Always use modern button styles like pill-shaped, or sharp button with interaction animations & color relevant to the app style
NEVER: use AI assistant Emoji characters for icons.
Every interaction needs micro-animations - hover states, transitions, parallax effects, and entrance animations. Static = dead.
Use 2-3x more spacing than feels comfortable. Cramped designs look cheap.
Subtle grain textures, noise overlays, custom cursors, selection states, and loading animations: separates good from extraordinary.
Main agent relies on these image URLs. Missing categories = main agent will use placeholder text which is FORBIDDEN
Prioritize using pre-existing components from src/components/ui when applicable
Components MUST use named exports (export const ComponentName = ...)
Pages MUST use default exports (export default function PageName() {...})
instructions_to_main_agent: 2. SETUP TAILWIND: Update font families in tailwind.config.js to match typography guidelines.
3. OVERRIDE RADIUS: Set default border radius to 2px or 4px (sm) for a sharper, technical look.
4. DASHBOARD LAYOUT: Create a high-density grid. Do not center content. Use full width with padding.
5. REAL-TIME DATA: Ensure price components can handle rapid updates without layout shifts (fix widths for numbers).
6. AI SIGNALS: Make them distinct. Use the 'Signal Blue' accent to highlight high-probability opportunities.
